name: Trickster5 The Video Game (2021 Edition)
description:
Trickster kept FUCKIN buggin me to release this garbage ass game. It's not even good. It's actually really bad and you should not play it.

Anyway, you play as Trickster 5 and you need to get anime back or something this plot is fucking stupid. I didn't bother changing anything about the game before release so what you see is what you get!

PEOPLE WHO I PUT INVOLUNTARILY INTO THE GAME
Trickster5 - Twitter

BR - Twitter

Blu Hood - Twitter

Endlassy - Somewhere probably

I am genuinely sorry for putting you people in this game you do not deserve this cruel fate
